TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScrollBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public MustInherit Class ScrollBar Inherits Control
public ref class ScrollBar abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 實作捲軸控制項的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality of a scroll bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不會繼承直接從類別。You typically do not inherit directly from the class. 若要建立您自己的捲軸列類別，繼承自或類別。To create your own scroll bar class, inherit from the or class. > [!NOTE] > 捲動方塊有時稱為捲軸之捲動方塊。The scroll box is sometimes referred to as the scroll thumb. 若要調整捲軸控制項的值範圍，設定和屬性。To adjust the value range of the scroll bar control, set the and properties. 若要調整移動捲動方塊的距離，設定和屬性。To adjust the distance the scroll box moves, set the and properties. 若要調整的捲動方塊的起始點，設定時最初顯示控制項的屬性。To adjust the starting point of the scroll box, set the property when the control is initially displayed. 使用者介面指導方針會建議和屬性設定相對於使用者會看到，不必包括看不見的組件的大小總計之檢視的大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果您有捲軸顯示大型影像，圖片方塊和屬性應該設定相對圖片方塊的大小，而非影像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並初始化並將它加入。The following example creates and initializes a and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Drawing.Rectangle GetScaledBounds (System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Drawing.SizeF factor, System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified specified);

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle GetScaledBounds(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Drawing.SizeF factor, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified specified) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetScaledBounds (bounds As Rectangle, factor As SizeF, specified As BoundsSpecified) As Rectangle
protected: override System::Drawing::Rectangle GetScaledBounds(System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Drawing::SizeF factor, System::Windows::Forms::BoundsSpecified specified);

span.span: A that specifies the initial bounds.
A that indicates the amount the current bounds should be increased by.

param.name: specified
param.span: 值的位元 (Bitwise) 組合，指出如何定義 所傳回的控制項大小和位置。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that indicate the how to define the control's size and position returned by .

summary.span: 傳回以指定的量來縮放 時所使用的界限。

span.span: Returns the bounds to use when the is scaled by a specified amount.
A specifying the scaled bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 helper 方法，供方法以傳回應該會調整控制項的界限。This is a helper method that used by the method to return the bounds that the control should be scaled by. 如果您想要重複使用，您可能會覆寫此方法縮放邏輯，但您需要提供您自己的界限。You may override this method if you wish to reuse scaling logic, but you need to supply your own bounds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LargeChange { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當捲動方塊大距離移動時，會從 屬性加或減的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下捲軸追蹤任一邊的捲軸 方塊中，在屬性變更的設定值根據屬性。When the user clicks in the scroll bar track on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. > [!NOTE] > 因此，當使用者按下 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 按鍵捲動方塊移，您可以處理按下按鍵事件。You can handle key press events so that when the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key the scroll box moves. 使用者介面指導方針會建議和屬性設定相對於使用者會看到，不必包括看不見的組件的大小總計之檢視的大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果您有捲軸顯示大型影像，圖片方塊和屬性應該設定相對圖片方塊的大小，而非影像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下列範例假設您已建立新增的至，並新增水平平和垂直至。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此範例中，屬性設定相對於的大小。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 您必須將參考加入和命名空間，才能執行這個範例。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可捲動範圍的上限值。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the scrollable range.
A numeric value.
The default value is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以考慮調整屬性，以動態方式以符合捲軸的父代人數像素大小或數目的資料列或顯示的程式行的大小。You might consider adjusting the property dynamically to match the size of the scroll bar's parent in proportion to pixel size or to the number of rows or lines displayed. 可以只以程式設計的方式達到最大值。The maximum value can only be reached programmatically. 捲軸的值無法連線到其最大值，透過在執行階段的使用者互動。The value of a scroll bar cannot reach its maximum value through user interaction at run time. 可以透過使用者互動的最大值等於 1 再加上屬性值減屬性值。The maximum value that can be reached through user interaction is equal to 1 plus the property value minus the property value. 如果有必要，您可以設定物件的大小為-1 至帳戶 1 詞彙的屬性。If necessary, you can set the property to the size of the object -1 to account for the term of 1. ## Examples 下列範例假設您已建立新增的至，並新增水平平和垂直至。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此範例中，屬性設定為大小再加上捲軸是否顯示加上的大小調整係數的大小屬性。In this example, the property is set to the size of the plus the size of the scrollbar if it is visible plus an adjustment factor of the size of the property. 您必須將參考加入和命名空間，才能執行這個範例。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例假設您已建立新增的至，並新增水平平和垂直至。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此範例中，屬性設定為 0。In this example, the property is set to 0. 您必須將參考加入和命名空間，才能執行這個範例。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseWheel(class System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseWheel (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: A

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項將會轉換成移動滑鼠滾輪捲動時進入焦點。The control will convert mouse wheel movements to scrolling when the is in focus. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnScroll(class System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs se) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnScroll (se As ScrollEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件處理常式和建立事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 這段程式碼假設和已建立在表單上按鈕的事件處理常式和事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 按一下按鈕時，捲軸上的屬性會在程式碼中調整。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 標籤會顯示目前的值屬性及變更它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您會注意到變更按鈕的捲軸值時僅限事件就會引發事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 相反地，當捲軸會捲動，以手動方式，之後立即引發事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnValueChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnValueChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件處理常式和建立事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 這段程式碼假設和已建立在表單上按鈕的事件處理常式和事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 按一下按鈕時，捲軸上的屬性會在程式碼中調整。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 標籤會顯示目前的值屬性及變更它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您會注意到變更按鈕的捲軸值時僅限事件就會引發事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 相反地，當捲軸會捲動，以手動方式，之後立即引發事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). summary.span: 發生於重繪控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is redrawn.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Scroll As ScrollEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於捲動方塊已經由滑鼠或鍵盤動作移動時。

span.span: Occurs when the scroll box has been moved by either a mouse or keyboard action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例將捲動圖片方塊中的映像。The following example scrolls an image in a picture box. 它會使用重繪新映像的一部分，每當使用者將捲動捲軸。It uses the of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#3)] 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別。The following code example uses the derived class . 事件處理常式和建立事件。Event handlers for the and events are created. 這段程式碼假設和已建立在表單上按鈕的事件處理常式和事件。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 按一下按鈕時，捲軸上的屬性會在程式碼中調整。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 標籤會顯示目前的值屬性及變更它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 您會注意到變更按鈕的捲軸值時僅限事件就會引發事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 相反地，當捲軸會捲動，以手動方式，之後立即引發事件事件。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SmallChange { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當捲動方塊小距離移動時，會加入或從 屬性減少的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下一個箭號的索引鍵或按下捲軸按鈕中，其中屬性變更的設定值根據屬性。When the user presses one of the arrow keys or clicks one of the scroll bar buttons, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 使用者介面指導方針會建議和屬性設定相對於使用者會看到，不必包括看不見的組件的大小總計之檢視的大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果您有捲軸顯示大型影像，圖片方塊和屬性應該設定相對圖片方塊的大小，而非影像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下列範例假設您已建立新增的至，並新增水平平和垂直至。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此範例中，屬性設定相對於的大小。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 您必須將參考加入和命名空間，才能執行這個範例。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TabStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可使用 TAB 鍵，將焦點 (Focus) 給予 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果使用者可使用 TAB 鍵將焦點給予控制項則為 ，否則為 false。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，則會將輸入的焦點設定為定位順序中的下一個控制項。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 控制與屬性值為`false`未被納入的定位順序中的控制項集合。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 您可以藉由設定控制項的操作索引標籤順序屬性值。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.

value.span: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

span.span: The text associated with this control.

A string that represents the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重繪所使用的值， ， ，和屬性。The method redraws the by using the values of the , , , and properties.

summary.span: 取得或設定表示捲軸控制項上的捲動方塊目前位置的數值。

span.span: Gets or sets a numeric value that represents the current position of the scroll box on the scroll bar control.
A numeric value that is within the and range.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將捲動圖片方塊中的映像。The following example scrolls an image in a picture box. 它會使用重繪新映像的一部分，每當使用者將捲動捲軸。It uses the of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何在執行此範例指示[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，請參閱[How to： 編譯及執行完整 Windows Form 程式碼範例使用 Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416)。For instructions about how to run this example in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416).
